extendedInfo.description: Tarot Angel Cards will strengthen your intuition, rediscover some of your psychic abilities and at the same time strengthen your communication with angels by asking questions or pleading for help and guidance.Every time you pull a card, you will awaken angel presence in your life and receive immediate message of angel love - that will direct you towards love for yourself and at the same time towards more loving relationships with other people. Tarot Angel Cards are jems. Angel's words will touch your heart with pure sincerity. These cards will bring answers to all the questions you have regarding yourself and others. Each time you pick an angelic card, you will receive a direct message of angelic love, awaken your psychic abilities and intuition. Beautiful angel pictures will fill your aura with angel healing energy.Product Features:â Message of the dayâ Past, present, futureâ Choose between 3 different readings â You can read the full meaning of each cardâ Angel reading for yourselfâ Angel reading for another personâ Some examples of asking questionâ Give readings anytime, anywhere  on your device â 9 different languages

reviews.title: Great affirmations
reviews.comment: I use this app for my inspirational card of the day and I must say I love the inspiring messages.
reviews.author: Dominique Mayfield

reviews.title: Nice daily affirmation
reviews.comment: I really wouldn\'t do this one again. You cant access the 3rd card without paying. Shouldn\'t be under free apps. There are better options, for Free.
reviews.author: Julie Franklin

reviews.title: gives good messages
reviews.comment: I have cards but very rarely use them as I always forget but having this app is great as I have it on the page i access every day to remind me to check my card for the day. I enjoy reading the meanings and find a connection with the meaning. would recommend them to anyone needing inspiration
reviews.author: Amanda Patterson

reviews.title: Fantastic set of cards
reviews.comment: Great lay out. Cards have been well done and thought out very smooth.
reviews.author: Claire Boyd

reviews.title: Good but not perfect
reviews.comment: The app is good in almost everythiing the only thing wrong is the zice of the letter please fix it because i love this app butt it is very dificult for me to read it.
reviews.author: Ana Fleming

reviews.title: It\'s good
reviews.comment: listen you don\'t have to pay for a third card. You could pick three individual cards or the two and one on it\'s own. Point being money won\'t stop \'angels\' from giving you information they want.
reviews.author: Dave Warren

reviews.title: I\'m very much pagan. I don\'t care much for Christian characters.
reviews.comment: I love this app. Very warm and comforting.  Seeing self thru feminine eyes. I know without doubt. The divine is female.wisdom, balance, prudence, love, reason and passion. Even to a fool. They know that\'s not traits of a male. Anyway it\'s a great app. The energy you put in. You get out of it. Do you blame a bad garden on a shovel or the person attending the garden?  Divination is no different.
reviews.author: Kevin H

reviews.comment: Love peace n hope to all
reviews.author: Valentina Ledbetter

reviews.title: Amazing Review. !
reviews.comment: This app is great anyways gives out positive messages. I would definitely recommend it to anyone:)))))
reviews.author: Tracey Dorismond

reviews.comment: Good fun, always positive.
reviews.author: Claire Johnson

reviews.title: Luv it...
reviews.comment: Worth appreciating d message...
reviews.author: Allizza Mennor

reviews.comment: Brilliant very helpfull
reviews.author: Keely roderick

reviews.title: Very  nice
reviews.comment: The cards have really nice messages. The only downfall is when you do a reading they ask for money before showing the future card. I don\'t remember reading that in the description
reviews.author: L Hardy

reviews.title: Do not recommend
reviews.comment: Doesnt say much. Repeating the same thing over. Have to pay to see the future card. No fun.
reviews.author: Mi Mi

reviews.title: Brilliant.
reviews.comment: Thanks for such a lovely app.
reviews.author: Jane Addams

reviews.title: Not bad but i have expected more
reviews.comment: Can\'t save the reading even though i bought a full version
reviews.author: Jessie Chui Yu Lau

reviews.title: Best angel app
reviews.comment: Brilliant
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Cool
reviews.comment: Nice app. Beautiful cards
reviews.author: marcelo soria

reviews.title: Great app
reviews.comment: Love this
reviews.author: Tammy Vanko

reviews.title: tarotangel cards
reviews.comment: i enjoy this, i feel like i have peace in my days asking the angels for guideness..
reviews.author: patti ann alford
